Openstack eLab

Lab 3 Lab 3 Setup Gerrit Account


Run your own host and try it!

How to log in your hosts?

Open your terminal, and type:
"ssh username@hostIP"
And input the password.

Host 1:

  • Host 1 IP: 10.241.1.100

  • Username: ubuntu

  • Password: oci123

Host 2:

  • Host 2 IP: 10.241.1.101

  • Username: ubuntu

  • Password: oci123

Host 3:

  • Host 3 IP: 10.241.1.102

  • Username: ubuntu

  • Password: oci123

Setup Gerrit Account

Step 1 - Login to the Instance ssh

Step 2 - Create the SSH Key Pair

ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 â€“C "email@example.com" -f ~/.ssh/gerrit

Step 3 - Setup the SSH Config

cat > ~/.ssh/config <<EOF
host review.openstack.org
HostName review.openstack.org
IdentityFile ~/.ssh/gerrit
EOF

Step 4 - Login to Gerrit

Step 5 - Choose Username on Gerrit

Step 6 - Submit Public SSH Key to Gerrit

Step 7 - Sign the Contributor License Agreement

  • Github
